description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/3918839713 at Sun Mar 12 23:45:57 UTC 2023

targets.expr: sum by (component) (rate({environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"} | json | __error__!=`JSONParserErr` | level="error"[$__interval]))

panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query for the given time.

targets.expr: sum by (job, handler, code) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*", handler="query"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Requests Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests against /query.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*", handler="query",code=~"5.."}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"thanos.*", handler="query"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Requests Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*", handler="query"}[$interval])))

panels.title: Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query_range for the given time range.

targets.expr: sum by (job, handler, code) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Requests Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests against /query_range.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*", handler="query_range",code=~"5.."}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Requests Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*", handler="query_range"}[$interval])))

panels.title: Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos-(.+)-storegateway.+", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"thanos-(.+)-storegateway.+", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos-(.+)-storegateway.+", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos-(.+)-storegateway.+", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval])))

panels.title: gRPC Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.
panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, cluster) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss", container="thanos-sidecar", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval])) / sum by (job, cluster) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{container="thanos-sidecar", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.
panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of alerts that successfully sent to alert manager.

targets.expr: sum by (job, alertmanager) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_alerts_sent_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Alert Sent Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of sent alerts.

targets.expr: sum by (pod) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_errors_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*"}[$interval])) / sum by (pod) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_alerts_sent_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Alert Sent Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to send alerts to alert manager.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_latency_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*"}[$interval])))

panels.title: Alert Sent Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of execution for compactions against blocks that are stored in the bucket by compaction group.
panels.title: Compaction Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of executed compactions against blocks that are stored in the bucket.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_group_compactions_failures_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_group_compactions_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"thanos.*"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Compaction Errors

title: thanos: Thanos / Overview
